title: Epic: Core types & service skeleton
description: Define shared IDs/config/IPC schemas, rkyv/bincode serialization, and bring up minimal windows-service host with dotenvy configuration loading.
acceptance_criteria: Core IDs stable (VolumeId/FileId/DocKey); config loads via dotenvy; core serialization ready; windows service installs and starts under dedicated account with SE_BACKUP/RESTORE; health probe returns OK.

title: Define core identifiers and metadata structs
description: Implement VolumeId/FileId/DocKey packing, flags bitfield, timestamps, and shared types for metadata/content docs aligned with plan §2.

title: Configuration model and dotenvy bootstrap
description: Create config structs (global, per-volume, index/scheduler settings), load .env via dotenvy in main entrypoints, and serialize to config/config.toml.

title: Core serialization crate
description: Add core-serialization with rkyv/bincode helpers, shared schemas for state files and IPC payloads, plus zero-copy memmap support.

title: Windows service skeleton
description: Implement service binary with windows-services crate, tokio runtime bootstrap, structured logging, graceful start/stop hooks, and health probe stub.

title: Service privilege model & hardening
description: Define service account/privileges (SE_BACKUP/RESTORE), tighten ACLs on programdata paths, avoid DLL hijacking; document install/run requirements.

title: Epic: NTFS events + metadata index
description: Implement volume discovery, MFT enumeration, USN journal tailing, metadata cache, and Tantivy metadata index.
acceptance_criteria: Initial metadata index built from MFT on one NTFS volume; USN tailer keeps metadata lag <5s under change load; journal wrap detected and resync succeeds; resilience: index corruption -> auto rebuild path.

title: Volume discovery and handle management
description: Enumerate NTFS volumes (GetLogicalDrives/Volume GUID), open handles with correct access/share flags, and track VolumeId<->GUID mapping.

title: Initial MFT enumeration to metadata docs
description: Stream MFT via usn-journal-rs, build FileMetaSeed -> Tantivy metadata documents, commit batches, and checkpoint progress.

title: USN journal tailer and resync
description: Implement change journal reader loop, translate to FileEvent, handle journal wrap detection and schedule incremental rescan when gaps detected.

title: Metadata cache + path reconstruction
description: Implement slotmap-based FileMeta cache, filename interner, small LRU for paths, and fallbacks to index when cache cold.

title: Tantivy metadata index schema + builder
description: Define index-meta schema (doc_key, name, path, ext, size, timestamps, flags), writer tuning for initial build, and reader config for service.

title: Volume state persistence
description: Persist per-volume state.rkyv (last_usn, journal_id, last_mft_scan_generation, settings), load on startup, and guard against corruption.

title: FST accelerator for filename prefixes
description: Build optional fst::Set/Map over normalized filenames, mmap-backed with small delta index; integrate query path fallback to Tantivy.

title: Index/journal resilience and recovery
description: Detect index corruption; auto-rename to .broken and trigger rebuild; detect USN journal wrap and schedule resync; handle power-loss replay.

title: Epic: Scheduler & background control
description: Idle detection, system load sampling, job queues, prioritization, and worker launch policy for metadata/content tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Idle/load state machine gates work; critical updates always processed; content jobs only in DeepIdle+low load; worker backoff on repeated failures; process priorities set per design.

title: Idle detection state machine
description: Implement Active/WarmIdle/DeepIdle tracking via GetLastInputInfo and clock, exposable to scheduler.

title: System load sampling
description: Use sysinfo to sample CPU/disk/memory every few seconds, compute thresholds for scheduler decisions, and expose to metrics.

title: Job queues and prioritization
description: Implement per-category queues (critical updates, metadata rebuilds, content indexing) with budgets and eligibility based on idle/load state.

title: Worker spawn policy and backoff
description: Batch selection for content jobs, spawn index-worker with limits, track results/errors, and implement backoff on failures.

title: Process and thread priority tuning
description: Set searchd to NORMAL priority, worker to BELOW_NORMAL/IDLE, optional job object caps, and avoid PROCESS_MODE_BACKGROUND_BEGIN clamp.

title: Epic: Content extraction & content index
description: Worker process, content Tantivy schema, Extractous/IFilter/OCR integration, resource caps, and job contract.
acceptance_criteria: Content index builds and commits; Extractous covers PDFs/Office/HTML/markdown; OCR optional for image-only docs; size/token limits enforced; worker exits after batch; component manager installs required binaries (e.g., Tesseract) with checksum.

title: Content index schema + writer tuning
description: Define index-content fields (doc_key, volume, name, path, ext, size, modified, content_lang, content), configure Tantivy writer heap/threads/merge policy for worker.

title: Extractous integration
description: Integrate extractous engine in worker, handle streaming/page-by-page extraction, enforce size/token limits, and map outputs to ExtractedContent.

title: Optional IFilter bridge
description: Add COM-based IFilter fallback for unsupported types behind feature flag; manage STA requirements and selection logic.

title: OCR integration for image-only docs
description: Integrate tesseract-rs/rusty-tesseract under limits, detect image-only PDFs/images, run per-page OCR, and merge text with language tagging.

title: Component manager for external binaries
description: Implement component manifest, download/verify/install flow for dependencies (e.g., Tesseract) into %LOCALAPPDATA%\UltraSearch\bin with SHA256 validation.

title: Worker job contract and lifecycle
description: Define job file schema (rkyv/bincode), worker CLI args, batch commit flow, per-file error handling, result reporting, and resource cleanup.

title: Epic: IPC, CLI, and protocol
description: Named pipe protocol, bincode framing, request/response handlers, and optional CLI tooling.
acceptance_criteria: Named pipe protocol versioned; SearchRequest/Response + Status handled; round-trip latency local <25ms p50; backpressure works; CLI search returns results for metadata and content queries.

title: IPC message schema & query AST
description: Define bincode-framed protocol messages (SearchRequest/Response, Status, Config) and shared query AST with field boosts and filters.

title: Named pipe server in service
description: Implement Tokio named pipe listener, per-connection tasks, framing with length prefix, dispatch to search/status handlers, and backpressure handling.
